article_text: Business owners across the region say traffic is hurting their bottom line. ‘It’s making it much harder for people to commute to work,’ says developer Mitchell Friedman.

article_metadata.news-keywords: traffic, Miami, South Florida, commuting, congestion, public transit, business

article_summary:
Business owners across the region say traffic is hurting their bottom line.
‘It’s making it much harder for people to commute to work,’ says developer Mitchell Friedman.
